data.name: D'LIRIUM Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
High quality D'LIRIUM soundtrack by Ihor Koval. Includes some deleted music.

Tracklist:
  • 00. Christmas Theme (2:25) (2:25)
  • 01. Mansion (1:06)
  • 02. Introduction Part-I (2:42)
  • 03. [Deleted] Pandemonium (2:38)
  • 04. Industrial (2:38)
  • 05. Cave (2:13)
  • 06. Graveyard (2:52)
  • 07. [Deleted] Nightmare Boss Battle (0:22)
  • 08. Cursed Gestas (0:22)
  • 09. Cursed Dismas (0:52)
  • 10. Cursed Claudia (0:54)
  • 11. Cursed Ada (1:03)
  • 12. Pandemonium (3:03)
  • 13. Introduction Part-II (2:48)
  • 14. Exhausted (1:26)
  • 15. Revelation (4:22)
  • 16. Maniac (1:10)
  • 17. Credits (2:20)
  • 18. Nightmare Boss Battle (0:59)
  • 19. Lanterns (3:16)
  • 20. Soul Sorcery (0:40)
  • 21. Pause Theme (2:55)
  • 22. Level Completed (2:34)
  • 23. Game Over (1:18)

  • 25. Main Theme (3:30)
  • 26. Final (0:41)

  • 28. Gestas Chase (3:03)

  • 30. Steam Machine (3:41)

  • 32. Credits Part-II (1:57)
  • 33. D'LIRIANT (2:46)
  • 34. D'LIRIANT-reprise (3:00)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98, XP, 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

data.legal_notice: D'LIRIUM © 2017 by Ihor Koval. All rights reserved.
